ComicInfo.Summary: 33 years ago, Christian Angelos, last of the warrior Archangels, mysteriously disappeared. But now the forces of Hell are assembling, and Heaven desperately needs its agent. Unfortunately, Angelos has finally resurfaced, only this time as Hollywood's hottest star with no memory of his prior life. Worse, his enchanted lance -- the only weapon capable of killing arch-demon Daemon Malecent ? is missing. It's time for GUARDIAN ANGEL, Heaven's last line of defense, to battle once again!
ComicInfo.Title: Guardian Angel [Part One]
